failed_criteria: Shelves have cleaning and non-cleaning items jumbled with no clear grouping
Loose items and debris inside/around cabinet
Personal or unrelated clutter mixed with supplies
action_plan: Organize shelves by grouping cleaning supplies separately from office items; remove or relocate unrelated items outside the cabinet.
Remove loose items and debris from inside the cabinet and floor; ensure all items rest stably on shelves or in bins.
Clear personal or unrelated clutter from inside the cabinet, leaving only cleaning supplies.
visual_feedback: Bottom shelf contains tangled cables and power strip not stably stored.
Multiple shelves have mixed office items (boxes and wires) intermingled with cleaning supplies without grouping.
Loose object on the floor near cabinet base poses safety hazard.

failed_criteria: At least one image must clearly show the designated cleaning supplies cabinet, with shelves visibly stocked in a reasonably organized manner.
action_plan: Retake photo showing the designated cleaning supplies cabinet clearly stocked with cleaning supplies arranged neatly on all shelves. Ensure the photo is well-lit, focused, and highlights organized cleaning products.
visual_feedback: Cabinet shelves are predominantly filled with office items and miscellaneous supplies; only a few cleaning bottles are visible on the bottom shelf, failing to demonstrate a properly stocked, organized cleaning cabinet.

failed_criteria: At least one image must clearly show the designated cleaning supplies cabinet, with shelves visibly stocked in a reasonably organized manner.
action_plan: Retake photo for D5: Cleaning Supplies & Cabinet Organization: Ensure the designated cleaning supplies cabinet is clearly visible and stocked with cleaning materials organized on the shelves.
visual_feedback: Submission photo shows a mostly empty cabinet with boxes and office items; lacks visible cleaning supplies on shelves.

failed_criteria: At least one image must clearly show the designated cleaning supplies cabinet, with shelves visibly stocked in a reasonably organized manner.
action_plan: Retake a photo showing the designated cleaning supplies cabinet stocked with cleaning chemicals (e.g., sprays, paper towels) organized neatly on shelves.
visual_feedback: No visible cleaning chemicals or supplies in the cabinet; shelves contain office and electronic supplies instead.

failed_criteria: At least one image must clearly show the designated cleaning supplies cabinet, with shelves visibly stocked in a reasonably organized manner.
All cleaning supplies and related chemicals are stored inside the designated cabinet.
action_plan: Retake photo showing the designated cleaning supplies cabinet with stocked shelves in an organized manner.

Cleaning supplies are placed outside the cabinet on open shelves, not inside the designated cabinet.
